data.lyric:
[ti:Mood]
[ar:24KGoldn,iann dior,Lil Ghost小鬼]
[al:Mood (Lil Ghost Remix) (Explicit)]
[by:qingxiu_karakal]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Mood (Lil Ghost Remix|Explicit) - 24kGoldn/iann dior/Lil Ghost小鬼
[00:00.61]词：Golden Landis Von Jones/Omer Fedi/Keegan Bach/Michael Olmo/LilGhost小鬼
[00:01.22]曲：Golden Landis Von Jones/Omer Fedi/Keegan Bach/Michael Olmo/LilGhost小鬼/陈令韬
[00:01.83]编曲：陈令韬/大肥猫BFCat/顺德
[00:02.44]制作人：陈令韬
[00:03.05]人声配唱：陈令韬
[00:03.66]录音师：李宗远@Studio21A
[00:04.27]音频编辑：李宗远@Studio21A
[00:04.88]混音/母带工程师：周天澈@Studio21A
[00:05.49]制作统筹：张馨艺Summer
[00:06.11]艺人统筹：黄泳涵/Roger Tsang/赵博洋
[00:06.72]企划：刘乃铭@流水纪/张馨艺Summer
[00:07.33]监制：Charles Liu/唐达/Ivy Li/Elin Her/Craig Lin/刘涛
[00:07.94]营销：索尼音乐 X 果然娱乐 X Hot Cake Studio
[00:08.55]封面设计：李彦君
[00:09.16]Lil Ghost：
[00:09.78]Why you always in a mood
[00:11.63]F**kin 'round actin' brand new
[00:13.55]I ain't tryna tell you what to do but try to play it cool
[00:16.88]Baby I ain't playing by your rules
[00:18.67]Everything look better with a view
[00:20.22]Why you always in a mood
[00:22.01]F**kin 'round actin' brand new
[00:24.09]I ain't tryna tell you what to do but try to play it cool
[00:27.42]Baby I ain't playing by your rules
[00:29.38]Everything look better with a view
[00:31.31]Lil Ghost：
[00:31.63]Oh my girl girl girl
[00:33.74]只想陪你品尝所有的苦涩
[00:36.04]
[00:36.73]I say no no no
[00:39.02]拜托你别再忽冷忽热
[00:41.56]从过去到了现在
[00:43.23]哥们儿依旧稳定发力
[00:44.94]都什么年代
[00:45.93]也不是不能离开你
[00:47.43]我这种天菜
[00:48.48]不要太受女孩欢迎
[00:50.20]
[00:50.93]Tell me how can I be your moonlight
[00:53.04]Iann Dior：
[00:53.41]We play games of love to avoid the depression
[00:56.80]
[00:58.10]We been here before and I won't be your victim
[01:02.57]24KGlodn：
[01:02.75]Why you always in a mood
[01:04.54]F**kin 'round actin' brand new
[01:06.33]I ain't tryna tell you what to do but try to play it cool
[01:09.43]Baby I ain't playing by your rules
[01:11.07]
[01:11.78]Everything look better with a view
[01:13.44]Why you always in a mood
[01:14.96]F**Kin' 'round actin' brand new
[01:16.80]I ain't tryna tell you what to do but try to play it cool
[01:20.10]Baby I ain't playing by your rules
[01:22.00]Everything look better with a view
[01:24.47]So why you tryin' to fake your love on the regular
[01:27.04]When you could be blowin' up just like my cellular
[01:29.53]I won't ever let a shorty go and set me up
[01:31.89]
[01:32.47]Only thing I need to know is if you wet enough
[01:34.92]I'm talking slik back kick back gang sippin' fourties
[01:37.77]You keep playing not another day with you shorty
[01:40.75]Mismatched fits that was way before you know me
[01:43.41]Got a lot of love well you better save it for me
[01:45.78]Lil Ghost：
[01:46.19]Touch my soul
[01:47.67]Every time 你想走 when I lose control
[01:50.11]Baby I know you can touch my soul
[01:52.95]When I say love you love you love you
[01:55.56]Why you always in a mood
[01:57.15]F**kin 'round actin' brand new
[01:58.48]
[01:59.18]I ain't tryna tell you what to do but try to play it cool
[02:02.33]Baby I ain't playing by your rules
[02:04.35]Everything look better with a view
[02:05.99]Why you always in a mood
[02:07.67]F**kin 'round actin' brand new
[02:09.10]
[02:09.61]I ain't tryna tell you what to do but try to play it cool
[02:12.80]Baby I ain't playing by your rules
[02:14.87]Everything look better with a view
[02:16.54]
[02:17.56]She wanna say
[02:18.02]她太过冷漠需要点energy
[02:19.57]
[02:20.12]What can I do
[02:20.86]我搞不清楚这是个好问题
[02:22.63]ごめんなさい
[02:23.52]我了解万物但不了解你
[02:25.36]就别再折磨我
[02:27.95]爷给你的爱不够用 请你丢进垃圾堆
[02:32.01]
[02:33.09]也就算背后跟朋友骂我也无所谓
[02:37.73]Baby I know you can touch my soul
[02:40.41]Every time 你想走 when I lose control
[02:42.89]Baby I know you can touch my soul
[02:45.81]When I say love you love you love you
